metadata.job_title: Sr. Data Engineer(hands on Palantir exp.)

seniority_level.evidence: Title includes "Sr." and required experience is 8-10 years, which aligns with senior level.

job_family.evidence: Job title explicitly states "Data Engineer" and responsibilities focus on data pipelines.

sub_specialty.evidence: Required skills include Hive and PySpark, which are typical batch ETL technologies; no streaming tools are mentioned.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Job description lists only technical requirements and does not mention people management or team leadership responsibilities.

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud provider (AWS, Azure, GCP) is referenced in the posting or extracted data.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No secondary cloud providers are mentioned.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Experience required with Hive and PySpark, which are batch processing frameworks.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Luigi, dbt, etc.) are cited.

storage_layer.evidence: Hive implies a data warehouse layer on Hadoop, while Hadoop/Hive ecosystems also serve as a data lake; both concepts are present.

remote_restriction.evidence: Extraction shows "locals only for onsite" with a US‑only restriction and a specific state (GA).

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is limited to the United States (GA), implying a focus on the US time zones, but no explicit timezone is stated.

relocation_required.evidence: Requirement is for local candidates only; no relocation assistance is mentioned.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is marked as "not_mentioned" in the extraction.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of OPT/CPT eligibility; work authorization is not discussed.

citizenship_required.evidence: Neither citizenship nor work‑authorization requirements are stated in the posting.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type and contract type are both listed as "not_mentioned".

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits (equity, PTO, learning budget, etc.) are listed in the extraction.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting does not discuss career progression, growth opportunities, or ladders.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs or senior‑junior collaboration are referenced.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions or advancement paths appears in the posting.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: The job description does not mention internal transfers or mobility.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) are described.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Four specific hard‑skill requirements are listed with no nice‑to‑have items, indicating a stringent set of must‑haves.

scope_definition.evidence: The description is concise and focuses solely on senior data‑engineering responsibilities.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required experience (8‑10 years) matches the senior title and the listed technical skills are appropriate for that level.
